description:
Noel wanted to do a dirty video because he just signed up to go into the Army and he wanted to do something different before he left.
He is currently working as a spinning instructor at a local health club. He had just finished a class when he showed up to meet me, so he was all sweaty. When he takes his pants off, notice that his underwear is quite damp with perspiration (call me weird, but... yum!).
Noel says he is straight. I thought differently when I first met him, maybe because he is soft spoken. It's not my place to question someone's sexual orientation, so I believe him (at least for now).
In any case, he has a nice, muscular body, a cute smile, and most importantly... a big dick.
title: Noel
